title: Flashlight with Shake
description: Access the flashlight of your device through this app, which gives you the ability to control your device's flash through a shake.

title: Mars Weather
description: Get the latest weather reports from the Red planet, with data from Insight,Curiosity and the Perseverance rovers.

title: URL Shortener
description: Shorten down large links using multiple shortening services and share URL's as simple QR codes.
